Doc: A type describing return which is driven by a Variance Calculation.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A type describing return which is driven by a Variance Calculation.
 #/
record FpML5.reporting.VarianceLeg {
  # Version aware identification of this leg.
  legIdentifier : FpML5.reporting.LegIdentifier?

  # A reference to the party responsible for making the payments defined by this structure.
  payerPartyReference : FpML5.reporting.PartyReference?

  # A reference to the account responsible for making the payments defined by this structure.
  payerAccountReference : FpML5.reporting.AccountReference?

  # A reference to the party that receives the payments corresponding to this structure.
  receiverPartyReference : FpML5.reporting.PartyReference?

  # A reference to the account that receives the payments corresponding to this structure.
  receiverAccountReference : FpML5.reporting.AccountReference?

  # Specifies the effective date of this leg of the swap. When defined in relation to a date specified somewhere else in the document (through the relativeDate component), this element will typically point to the effective date of the other leg of the swap.
  effectiveDate : FpML5.reporting.AdjustableOrRelativeDate?

  # Specifies the termination date of this leg of the swap. When defined in relation to a date specified somewhere else in the document (through the relativeDate component), this element will typically point to the termination date of the other leg of the swap.
  terminationDate : FpML5.reporting.AdjustableOrRelativeDate?

  # Specifies the underlyer of the leg.
  underlyer : FpML5.reporting.Underlyer?

  settlementType : string?

  settlementDate : FpML5.reporting.AdjustableOrRelativeDate?

  # Settlement Amount
  settlementAmount : FpML5.reporting.Money

  # Settlement Currency for use where the Settlement Amount cannot be known in advance
  settlementCurrency : string

  # Quanto, Composite, or Cross Currency FX features.
  fxFeature : FpML5.reporting.FxFeature?

  # Valuation of the underlyer.
  valuation : FpML5.reporting.EquityValuation?

  # Specifies, in relation to each Equity Payment Date, the amount to which the Equity Payment Date relates. Unless otherwise specified, this term has the meaning defined in the ISDA 2002 Equity Derivatives Definitions.
  amount : FpML5.reporting.VarianceAmount?

  id : string?

}

legIdentifier.Doc: Version aware identification of this leg.
legIdentifier.Name: legIdentifier

payerPartyReference.Doc: A reference to the party responsible for making the payments defined by this structure.
payerPartyReference.Name: payerPartyReference

payerAccountReference.Doc: A reference to the account responsible for making the payments defined by this structure.
payerAccountReference.Name: payerAccountReference

receiverPartyReference.Doc: A reference to the party that receives the payments corresponding to this structure.
receiverPartyReference.Name: receiverPartyReference

receiverAccountReference.Doc: A reference to the account that receives the payments corresponding to this structure.
receiverAccountReference.Name: receiverAccountReference

effectiveDate.Doc: Specifies the effective date of this leg of the swap. When defined in relation to a date specified somewhere else in the document (through the relativeDate component), this element will typically point to the effective date of the other leg of the swap.
effectiveDate.Name: effectiveDate

terminationDate.Doc: Specifies the termination date of this leg of the swap. When defined in relation to a date specified somewhere else in the document (through the relativeDate component), this element will typically point to the termination date of the other leg of the swap.
terminationDate.Name: terminationDate

underlyer.Doc: Specifies the underlyer of the leg.
underlyer.Name: underlyer

settlementCurrency.Doc: Settlement Currency for use where the Settlement Amount cannot be known in advance
settlementCurrency.Name: settlementCurrency

fxFeature.Doc: Quanto, Composite, or Cross Currency FX features.
fxFeature.Name: fxFeature

amount.Doc: Specifies, in relation to each Equity Payment Date, the amount to which the Equity Payment Date relates. Unless otherwise specified, this term has the meaning defined in the ISDA 2002 Equity Derivatives Definitions.
amount.Name: amount
